VAT £ inc.VAT Options Colour: Black Back Panel White Back Panel Clear Back Panel Clear Frost Back Panel Coloured Back Panel 2: 2: Qty Add to basket Get a quote Staff Photo Notice Boards - Perspex Acrylic Staff photo notice boards, or "Meet The Team" boards are a perfect way of letting people know who's who in a school, NHS Wards, general office and commercial workplace, recreation centres, reception areas, etc. Each clear pocket allows a small photo of a relevent member of staff. Options available include: choice of back acrylic colour, the number of photo pockets. We also offer a secure, tamper proof version, please click here for further details. NEW! We can now offer staff boards with your name and logo printed directlty to the top of the display - call for details. Features and Benefits: Please double click on the above images of our acrylic staff photo boards to zoom into a more detailed view Staff photo boards provide a professioal looking wall mounted display panel for quick reference of staff / team members Choice of black, white, clear or clear frost 5mm thick acrylic back panel with polished edges. Corners are rounded with no sharp edges Clear acrylic photo pockets allow staff photos to be changed quickly and easily Supplied with 4 polished sign fittings to give that floating effect off a wall Each photo pocket size is 75mm high x 50mm wide Header panel pocket is 260mm wide x 50mm high Please see the table below for our standard sized staff photo boards. We also manufacture custom sized boards if you require different sized pockets or different quantities of pockets - please call us on 01202 480104 for further details. Staff photo board prices are detailed in the drop down menu at the top of the page. Manufactured to order in our factory in Christchurch, Dorset, UK. Please allow 5 working days for delivery Please see our stand off fittings instructions by clicking here Looking for a a more secure staff photo board which can't be tampered with? Check out our Secure Staff Photo Boards ! Looking for a staff photo board with a different coloured back panel? We have a range of colours available other than our standard colours listed! Please contact us for a quote. Looking for a staff photo board with bespoke printing and branding to suit your business? With state of the art printers, we are able to fully print or brand these staff boards with your logos and messages! If this is something you are interested in, contact us for a quote! Code Photo Pockets Frame Size Width x Height (mm) SB10 10 430mm x 325mm SB20 20 430mm x 515mm SB30 30 500mm x 610mm SB40 40 640mm x 610mm SB50 50 780mm x 610mm SB60 60 780mm x 705mm SB65 65 800mm x 740mm SB70 70 780mm x 800mm SB80 80 780mm x 895mm SB100 100 780mm x 1085mm SB120 120 920mm x 1085mm SB140 140 1060mm x 1085mm SB160 160 1200mm x 1090mm Displays UK provide daily deliveries to most towns and cities in the UK including: Christchurch, Poole, Bournemouth, Swanage, Dorchester, Ferndown, Shaftesbury Sherborne Sturminster Newton Swanage Weymouth Ringwood New Forest Fordingbridge Salisbury Thank you for visiting our website Product Code: 64674569876345 Specification Code 64674569876345 Style Staff Photo Board Location Wall Mounted Weight 10.000 Kg Secured by sagePay Pay with PayPal Pay with Mastercard Pay with Visa × Items Quick basket Newsletter Signup Submit Exhibition Stands Outdoor Displays Display Cases Exhibition & Display Boards for Hire or Rent Leaflet, Brochure, Menu & Card Holders Banner Stands Counters & Plinths Noticeboards & Whiteboards Signage & Perspex Frames Display Boards Specialist Displays Perspex Cut To Size Displays (UK) Limited Displays UK are located in Christchurch, on the Hampshire / Dorset border. staffboard HR Software [has_children] [de] Dashboard [child] [de] HR-Exzellenz-Dashboard Recruiting (ATS) [child] [de] Gestalten Sie bewusst die Zukunft Ihrer Organisation! Digitale Personalakte [child] [de] Mit der digitalen Personalakte haben Sie die Daten Ihrer Mitarbeiter immer im Blick Abwesenheitsmanagement [child] [de] Organisieren Sie übersichtlich & schnell Ihre Abwesenheiten Feedback & Performance [child] [de] Fördern Sie aktiv die persönliche Entwicklung Ihrer Mitarbeiter durch konstruktives Feedback Learning [child] [de] Planen Sie die Weiterentwicklung Ihrer Mitarbeiter Zeiterfassung [child] [de] Optimieren Sie die HR-Zeiterfassung Lohnabrechnung [child] [de] Mit dem Modul für Lohn & Gehalt erhalten Sie eine guten Überblick für die nächste Lohnabrechnung. Organigramm [child] [de] Visualisieren die Hierarchie und Struktur Ihres Teams Preise [de] Reports [child] [de] Gewinnen Sie wertvolle Einblicke in Ihre Belegschaft mit anpassbaren Berichten, Echtzeitanalysen und Datenvisualisierungstools. HR Insights [de] Unternehmen [has_children] [de] Unternehmen [child] [de] Kooperationspartner [child] [de] Karriere [child] [de] FAQ [child] [de] Kontakt [de] Login [de] HR Software [has_children] [en] Dashboard [child] [en] HR Excellence Dashboard Recruiting (ATS) [child] [en] Consciously shape the future of your organization! Digital Personnel File [child] [en] With the digital personnel file, you always have an overview of your employees' data Absences [child] [en] Organize your absences clearly and quickly Feedback & Performance [child] [en] Actively promote the personal development of your employees through constructive feedback Learning [child] [en] Plan the development of your employees Time Tracking [child] [en] Streamline HR Time Tracking Payroll [child] [en] The module for wages and salaries gives you a good overview for the next payroll. Orgchart [child] [en] Visualize your team's hierarchy and structure Pricing [en] Reports [child] [en] Gain valuable insights into your workforce with customizable reports, real-time analytics, and data visualization tools. HR Insights [en] Company [has_children] [en] About Us [child] [en] Partners [child] [en] Career [child] [en] FAQ [child] [en] Contact [en] Login [en] DE EN ONLINE DEMO BUCHEN Die HR Software für Unternehmensgestalter Ihr Copilot im HR Team Mit staffboard gestalten Sie Ihr Personalwesen nach den Bedürfnissen Ihrer Organisation. Sie schaffen mehr Zeit und Transparenz für Ihr Team, in einer modernen HR Software. JETZT KOSTENLOS TESTEN Good Bye, Papier Chaos! Herzlich Willkommen, Digitale Personalakte! Mit Hilfe der digitalen Mitarbeiterverwaltung können Sie alle Informationen über Ihre Mitarbeiter übersichtlich an einem Ort abspeichern. Suchen Sie mühsam nach Arbeitsverträgen, Attesten oder sonstigen Mitarbeiterdokumenten und verlieren dadurch wertvolle Zeit? Mit unserer Digitalen Personalakte finden Sie alles auf einen Blick im Mitarbeiterprofil. Dank des Employee Self Service (ESS) können zahlreiche Daten eigenständig von den Mitarbeitern gepflegt werden. So sparen Sie Zeit, Geld und natürlich Nerven für andere wichtige Themen. Bewerbermanagement leicht gemacht Mit unserem übersichtlichen Recruiting Modul verlieren Sie nie mehr einen Bewerber aus den Augen. Durch intuitives Drag & Drop können Sie ihre Bewerber schnell durch die Phasen Ihres individuellen Bewerbungsprozesses leiten. Eingangsbestätigungen werden automatisiert versendet und personalisierte Terminvereinbarungen oder Absagen sind mit einem Klick möglich. Viele Funktionen wie das Abgeben von Bewertungen für Bewerber, schreiben von Kommentaren und die Einbindung weiterer Teammitglieder sind problemlos möglich. STAFFBOARD 30 TAGE KOSTENLOS TESTEN! JETZT ANMELDEN Eine kleine Auswahl unserer treuen Kunden. "Wir sind an dem Punkt, an dem wir ohne dieses Tool schlicht nicht arbeiten könnten." Jakob Schoroth (Reparando GmbH) Managing Director ✔️ staffboard wurde in Deutschland gegründet und hat seinen Hauptsitz in München. ✔️ Die Daten werden ausschließlich in Deutschland verarbeitet und verschlüsselt gespeichert. ✔️ Regelmäßige Updates und Backups sorgen für größtmögliche Sicherheit. Zudem liegen ISO-Zertifizierungen der Hosting Provider vor. ✔️ Die staffboard HR Software und die Daten werden in Rechenzentren in Deutschland gehostet. ✔️ Unternehmen mit dem Siegel hinterlegen beim BITMi e.V. den Standard ihrer Maßnahmen bzgl. Datenschutz. ✔️ Für den Vertrag mit den Hosting Provider gilt ausschließlich deutsches Recht, insbesondere das deutsche Datenschutzrecht, das BGB und das HGB. ✔️ Wir unterliegen der Kontrolle eines externen und unabhängigen Datenschutzbeauftragten. ✔️ Eine AV-Vereinbarung mit jedem Kunden gewährleistet Datenschutz und Datensicherheit. ✔️ Unsere Mitarbeiter sind im Umgang mit sensiblen, personenbezogenen Daten geschult und erhalten regelmäßige Unterweisungen. ✔️ 100% Service: Bei Fragen zum Produkt finden Sie stets einen deutschsprachigen Ansprechpartner. ✔️ 100% Qualität: Die in Deutschland designte staffboard HR Software wird auch in Deutschland getestet. ✔️ 100% Zukunft: Die staffboard HR Software ist investitionssicher und wird kontinuierlich weiterentwickelt und aktualisiert. Melden Sie sich für unseren Newsletter an, um regelmäßig über neue Funktionen und Produkt Updates informiert zu werden. Registrien Email sent! Check your inbox to complete your signup. Digitalisieren Sie Ihre HR Prozesse Unsere staffboard HR Software automatisiert und vereinfacht alle wesentlichen Personalprozesse. Dashboard Recruiting (ATS) Digitale Personalakte Abwesenheitsmanagement Feedback & Performance Learning Zeiterfassung Lohnabrechnung Organigramm Reports Kostenlos & unverbindlich Tage testen * Ich akzeptiere die Datenschutzbestimmungen und die AGB . Jetzt anmelden Benutzerfreundlich Unser intuitives Design ermöglicht eine steile Lernkurve ohne große Einarbeitung. Flexibel Jedes Unternehmen ist anders – und das wissen wir. Darum lässt sich staffboard an Ihre Anforderungen anpassen. Online Greifen Sie von überall mit einer verschlüsselten Verbindung auf staffboard zu. SUPPORT Allgemeine Fragen zum Produkt? 089 - 1250 1458 contact@staffboard.de Für technischen Support innerhalb der Software steht Ihnen ein Ticketsystem zur Verfügung. Contact Us Want to Buy Wine? Go to Shop WHO WE ARE The Tapster Story The story of Tapster began in England in approximately 1617, when the nickname tapster first referred to a bartender serving alcoholic drinks (mostly beer) from a tap. This nickname lived on in remote English villages for about 200 years before slowly dying out in the 19th and 20th centuries. And just as the long waits for bartenders reached a feverish pitch at the beginning of the 21st century, tapster was reborn in Chicago. Unlike in Old England, however, the new Tapster has become each and every one of us (each of us over the age of 21, of course). Tapster in The Press Dogs Are Allowed at Tapster Tapster Is Awesome!

Our tasting room franchise opportunity eliminates much of the overhead and headaches of a typical bar and offers entrepreneurs a proven blueprint and ongoing support to deliver a true Tapster experience. Who We Are | Americantaproomsg top of page Home Who We Are Beers Food ATR Rewards Beer Geek Speaks Contact More... Use tab to navigate through the menu items. ABOUT AMERICAN TAPROOM A SIMPLE IDEA American Taproom was founded by three beer enthusiasts with more than 30 years experience running busy bars, bustling restaurants, and active beer retail and distribution businesses.  We aren’t just in the beer bar business, we are in the beer business from nose to tail and we can’t wait for you to love beer as much as we do! We realized this passion by recognizing the critical importance of proper beer service, and how this comes to our customers through a team of servers with the knowledge, the love of each and every beer on tap to keep, pour, and serve not only great beer but a great beer experience! Each and every one of our servers behind the bar is a Certified Beer Server (Level 1), certified by the Cicerone Certification Program.  American Taproom also has 2 of the only 6 Certified Cicerones (Level 2) in Singapore to help curate the selection, and ensure you’re experiencing beer at its best! Bar Manager/Founder Johnny Christensen | Level 2 Certified Cicerone Coming from an extensive F&B and craft beer background in the US, Johnny is one out of the six Certified Cicerones that can be found in Singapore. He is the main figure that oversees operations at American Taproom. Johnny is also the owner of the retail craft beer store, Beer Force, that is located in Holland Village. Our Locations American Taproom, Stanley 2 Stanley St Singapore 068721 ​ +65 8809 1974 American Taproom, Geylang 71/73 Geylang Road Singapore 389195 ​ +65 8181 4267 American Taproom, Waterloo 261 Waterloo Street, #01-23 Singapore 180261 ​ +65 9632 1570 Operating Hours *Our hours may vary depending on how busy we are. Please give us a call/WhatsApp us to confirm before you visit, especially near closing hours! Monday - Thursday: 11.30am - 11.00pm Friday & Saturday: 11.30am - 12:00am Sunday: Closed Monday - Wednesday: 3pm - 12am Thursday - Sunday: 11:30am - 12am Monday - Sunday 12 noon - 12:00am info@americantaproom.com.sg © 2025 Copyright - American Taproom. All Rights Reserved. bottom of page

About Us | Pour Tap House HOME EVENTS ON TAP MENU ON TAP COCKTAILS SPIRITS TO GO BEER AND COCKTAILS WINE, CANS, GLUTEN FREE SODAS, N/A, SNACKS ABOUT CONTACT Get in touch 555-555-5555 info@pourtaphouse.com EVENTS ON TAP MENU ON TAP COCKTAILS SPIRITS TO GO BEER AND COCKTAILS WINE, CANS, GLUTEN FREE SODAS, N/A, SNACKS ABOUT CONTACT CONTACT US ABOUT POUR TAP HOUSE Mission Our mission is to provide the community an exceptional environment to socialize, relax and interact with one another while enjoying a wide selection of beers, craft seasonal cocktails, and an envious selection of bourbon … one "Pour" at a time. Who We Are Pour is a craft beer tap house with 30 draft lines focusing on the best beer we can source. We feature local, national, and global breweries on constant rotation. Our high-end whiskey selection features the world's best distilleries. We also have a passion for creating perfectly-crafted cocktails. We've been nominated for best cocktails in Denver and make one of the best Old Fashioned's in Colorado. Feel free to talk to any of our bartenders about your pallet preferences for a beer or cocktail recommendation. Food isn't our specialty so we allow you to bring your favorite food in, or dine from one of the quality food trucks we invite to our neighborhood almost nightly. We look forward to seeing you at Pour and will gladly host any type of social gathering you can dream up. Contact us to inquire about renting our mezzanine or entire bar to host your event. What People are saying.... Something for Everyone " Pour Tap House truly has a wide variety of beers, especially styles of beer from so many local breweries (not just the crowd favorites). They also have an extensive bourbon and whisky list, plus killer cocktails. Meaning there is actually something for everyone " - Liv R MashIt Hidden Gem " I found this little Gem.... Great selection of local beers. Great Bourbon selection. Mary was a sweet, cute and interesting person. They open the garage door and the breeze came in and it was amazing. If you have a few hours of spend before you go to the airport, this is your spot. " - Bruno FabuFit Cool Little Spot " A cool little spot for drinks, came here with my brother and his friend. I ordered a old fashion and a whiskey sour I forgot the name. Delicious drinks and well priced.
